item.description:
This is a joint meetup of the local Permaculture and Peak Oil groups ... since eating local food is a top priority for both!

Please join us to hear Roger speak about what is happening with Maine's Eat Local Food Coaltion and with the local food movement in general.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Guest Speaker: Eat Local Foods Coalition, Roger Dioron
